import React from 'react' import './Header.css' import SearchIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Search'; import ShoppingCartIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ShoppingCart'; import { Link, Route } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useStateValue } from './StateProvider' function Header() { const [{basket}, dispatch ] = useStateValue(); console.log(basket) return (
Hello Guest Sign-in
Returns & orders
Your Prime
{basket?.length }
) } export default Header
